org.apache.flink.runtime.highavailability

接口 HighAvailabilityServices

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractNonHaServices, AbstractYarnNonHaServices, EmbeddedHaServices, StandaloneHaServices, YarnHighAvailabilityServices, YarnIntraNonHaMasterServices, YarnPreConfiguredMasterNonHaServices, ZooKeeperHaServices

    public interface HighAvailabilityServices
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The HighAvailabilityServices give access to all services needed for a highly-available setup. In particular, the services provide access to highly available storage and registries, as well as distributed counters and leader election.
    • ResourceManager leader election and leader retrieval
    • JobManager leader election and leader retrieval
    • Persistence for checkpoint metadata
    • Registering the latest completed checkpoint(s)
    • Persistence for the BLOB store
    • Registry that marks a job's status
    • Naming of RPC endpoints

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static JobID DEFAULT_JOB_ID
      This JobID should be used to identify the old JobManager when using the HighAvailabilityServices.
      static java.util.UUID DEFAULT_LEADER_ID
      This UUID should be used when no proper leader election happens, but a simple pre-configured leader is used.

    • 字段详细资料

      • DEFAULT_LEADER_ID

        static final java.util.UUID DEFAULT_LEADER_ID
        This UUID should be used when no proper leader election happens, but a simple pre-configured leader is used. That is for example the case in non-highly-available standalone setups.

      • DEFAULT_JOB_ID

        static final JobID DEFAULT_JOB_ID
        This JobID should be used to identify the old JobManager when using the HighAvailabilityServices. With Flip-6 every JobManager will have a distinct JobID assigned.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getResourceManagerLeaderRetriever

        LeaderRetrievalService getResourceManagerLeaderRetriever()
        Gets the leader retriever for the cluster's resource manager.

      • getDispatcherLeaderRetriever

        LeaderRetrievalService getDispatcherLeaderRetriever()
        Gets the leader retriever for the dispatcher. This leader retrieval service is not always accessible.

      • getJobManagerLeaderRetriever

        @Deprecated
LeaderRetrievalService getJobManagerLeaderRetriever(JobID jobID)
        已过时。 This method should only be used by non Flip-6 code where the JobManager acts as the master.
        Gets the leader retriever for the job JobMaster which is responsible for the given job
        参数:
        jobID - The identifier of the job.
        返回:
        Leader retrieval service to retrieve the job manager for the given job

      • getJobManagerLeaderRetriever

        LeaderRetrievalService getJobManagerLeaderRetriever(JobID jobID,
                                                    java.lang.String defaultJobManagerAddress)
        Gets the leader retriever for the job JobMaster which is responsible for the given job
        参数:
        jobID - The identifier of the job.
        defaultJobManagerAddress - JobManager address which will be returned by a static leader retrieval service.
        返回:
        Leader retrieval service to retrieve the job manager for the given job

      • getResourceManagerLeaderElectionService

        LeaderElectionService getResourceManagerLeaderElectionService()
        Gets the leader election service for the cluster's resource manager.
        返回:
        Leader election service for the resource manager leader election

      • getDispatcherLeaderElectionService

        LeaderElectionService getDispatcherLeaderElectionService()
        Gets the leader election service for the cluster's dispatcher.
        返回:
        Leader election service for the dispatcher leader election

      • getJobManagerLeaderElectionService

        LeaderElectionService getJobManagerLeaderElectionService(JobID jobID)
        Gets the leader election service for the given job.
        参数:
        jobID - The identifier of the job running the election.
        返回:
        Leader election service for the job manager leader election

      • getCheckpointRecoveryFactory

        CheckpointRecoveryFactory getCheckpointRecoveryFactory()
        Gets the checkpoint recovery factory for the job manager
        返回:
        Checkpoint recovery factory

      • getSubmittedJobGraphStore

        SubmittedJobGraphStore getSubmittedJobGraphStore()
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the submitted job graph store for the job manager
        返回:
        Submitted job graph store
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if the submitted job graph store could not be created

      • getRunningJobsRegistry

        RunningJobsRegistry getRunningJobsRegistry()
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the registry that holds information about whether jobs are currently running.
        返回:
        Running job registry to retrieve running jobs
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createBlobStore

        BlobStore createBlobStore()
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the BLOB store in which BLOBs are stored in a highly-available fashion.
        返回:
        Blob store
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the blob store could not be created

      • close

        void close()
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Closes the high availability services, releasing all resources.

        This method does not delete or clean up any data stored in external stores (file systems, ZooKeeper, etc). Another instance of the high availability services will be able to recover the job.

        If an exception occurs during closing services, this method will attempt to continue closing other services and report exceptions only after all services have been attempted to be closed.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if an exception occurred while closing these services.

      • closeAndCleanupAllData

        void closeAndCleanupAllData()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Closes the high availability services (releasing all resources) and deletes all data stored by these services in external stores.

        After this method was called, the any job or session that was managed by these high availability services will be unrecoverable.

        If an exception occurs during cleanup, this method will attempt to continue the cleanup and report exceptions only after all cleanup steps have been attempted.

        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if an exception occurred while closing these services or cleaning up data stored by them.
